member.name: T:Rms.Platform.DataServer.ClientDriver.Wcf.RmsMessage
member.summary: This custom message type helps to get rid of default XML/SOAP features and work with raw data streams over TCP/IP. Works with and . Server interface must be based on Message in-out unimethod. Serialization, encoding and formatting features of WCF are completely disabled.
